data.title: David Gest, music producer and Liza Minnelli's ex
data.meta_description: David Gest, US television personality and ex-husband of actress Liza Minnelli, is found dead in a five-star London hotel in unexplained circumstances, police and a friend say.
data.text:
David Gest, US television personality and ex-husband of actress Liza Minnelli, has been found dead in a five-star London hotel in unexplained circumstances, police and a friend said.

Gest's body was found at the Four Seasons Hotel in the Canary Wharf district.

The 62-year-old had been due to tour Britain in an autobiographical musical show, David Gest Is Not Dead But Alive With Soul, later this year.

"It is with great sadness that I can confirm that David Gest has died today," his friend Imad Handi said in a statement released to media.

"David was truly larger than life. He was not just a huge talent and a dear friend but a showbiz icon."

A spokesman for Scotland Yard said police officers were called to the hotel just after 10:00am (local time) "to reports of an unexplained death of a man in his 60s".

"London Ambulance Service were called to the scene. Life was pronounced extinct at the hotel," the spokesman said.

Gest was married to Minnelli from 2002 to 2007 but they had a bitter divorce, with him accusing her of beating him while she was drunk.

He was a close friend of Michael Jackson, producing a documentary about the late singer in 2011 and a tribute tour featuring the King of Pop's brother Tito in 2012.

Gest also appeared on a string of reality television shows in Britain.
